title: (28240) Hoyo de Manzanares - 11 Camino del Cementerio
title_short: (28240) Hoyo de Manzanares - 11 Camino del Cementerio
description: Parking for vans in a quiet place a bit out of town. Access open 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. Access gate to the park "la cabilda". Drinking water source ten minutes walk inside the park. There are several sources inside; They are not signposted, but the path is wide enough to find them easily. Quiet and discreet place, little frequented except for summer weekends during the day.

title: (28240) Hoyo de Manzanares - 34A Avenida de Juan Carlos I
title_short: (28240) Hoyo de Manzanares - 34A Avenida de Juan Carlos I
description: Se entra por una calle al parecer privada, pero no lo es. te deja justo en el campo. Es llano, pero no hay servicios. pasea mucha gente al perro por las mañanas, pero muy calmado. a dos minutos del centro del pueblo.

title: (28770) Colmenar Viejo - Calle del Beneficio
description: Creepy and lonely parking at night, near a militarized zone, and plenty of space for your "dog" poo. Great if you want to stay somewhere more private outside of Madrid. Hiking opportunities with a great view atop a mountainous region.

title: (28248) La Berzosa - 8 Avenida la Berzosa
description: Parking in Berzosa Park. Quiet place to park and spend the night. The car park is not for motorhomes, but then there is space for some motorhomes and if you go a little further (towards the city), on the right, there is a esplanade of land where it is even easier for motorhomes. The site is perfect for trekking and mountain biking, it is very beautiful. The city has a lot of life

title: (28770) Colmenar Viejo - Carretera de Colmenar Viejo
title_short: (28770) Colmenar Viejo - Carretera de Colmenar Viejo
description: Small car park near the medieval bridge. Nice place for a picnic. By a main road but not too busy at night. No facilities other than picnic benches.

title: (28412) El Boalo - 579 Carretera de Colmenar Viejo
title_short: (28412) El Boalo - 579 Carretera de Colmenar Viejo
description: Picnic area at the entrance to the town of Cerceda coming from Madrid. There is a small flat area to leave the van and picnic tables and rubbish bins. It is attached to the road but does not have much traffic at night.

title: (28400) Collado Villalba - 82 Calle Mallorca
description: Quite flat quiet parking located between urbanizations.

title: (28411) Moralzarzal - 36 Calle España
description: Laundry at the Meroil petrol station 5 min walk from the Moralzarzal district.

title: (28413) -
description: Area with tables and chairs, the river passes next to it, half an hour walk to Manzanares del Real. You cannot stay overnight.

title: (28290) Las Rozas de Madrid - 4 Calle Chile
title_short: (28290) Las Rozas de Madrid - 4 Calle Chile
description: Parking lots in a very quiet street near gás station

title: (28412) Moralzarzal - 11B Urbanización la Herradura
description: Public parking next to Mercadona in a relatively quiet place. Short level spaces within the parking lot. Possibility of parking in line in front with any size.

title: (28770) Colmenar Viejo - 17 Calle del Padre Claret
title_short: (28770) Colmenar Viejo - 17 Calle del Padre Claret
description:
Parking next to the courts and the market from the viewpoint.
There is a self-service laundry, which can park here, see Colmenar Viejo, make purchase in the market and doing a washing machine.

title: (28411) Moralzarzal - 3 Calle de la Tejera
description: Public parking of the Tejera. Fairly quiet. Next to a park with tables and trees. There are services, but they are closed. In the park there is a fountain. Next to the town, with all the services; Supermarket, bar, restaurant, hardware store. Ideal for walking or cycling routes

title: (28413) El Boalo - 18 Calle de la Peña Hoyuela
title_short: (28413) El Boalo - 18 Calle de la Peña Hoyuela
description: Parking in the center of the village 3 minutes from the plaza del ayuntamiento, very quiet for the night.

title: (28413) El Boalo - 2 Avenida de la Paz
title_short: (28413) El Boalo - 2 Avenida de la Paz
description: Parking in raised ground on a municipal ground. It is a quiet place to spend the night, even if it is in the village. It is very close to El Boalo access to La Pedriza. In a large park where there are sports fields, a fountain, etc. Area with very nice views and lots of shade. Wooded and sheltered. At City Hall, they told us it was ok if they are not long stays. The first week of July, apparently, there is a feria. Maybe there are more difficulties. We had two nights without problems, there was only one other van. Great for walking in the Sierra.

name: Dehesa Park
title: (28400) Dehesa Park
description: Dehesa Park car park. Area with trees. Picnic area, fountains, circuit of about 4 km surrounded by cows, bulls, horses... Chiringuito nearby. About 10 minutes walk from the village of Villalba with all services (pharmacy-opencor-bakery-shops, municipal swimming pool and restaurants).

title: (28410) Manzanares el Real - Avenida de Mataelpino
title_short: (28410) Manzanares el Real - Avenida de Mataelpino
description: Manzanares el Real; area on the side of the road, dirty.

title: (28410) Manzanares el Real -
description: Municipal car park next to the roundabout that goes in the direction of La Pedriza. Open from 8 to 22. Good option for large vehicles

title: (28413) El Boalo - 6 M-617
description: Great place to come and relax after visiting Madrid. All services clean and free, large parking area for motorhomes with views to the Sierras. Town has bakery, small supermarket and a couple of bars. New bollards with electrical supply but not commission yet.

title: (28410) Manzanares el Real - 3 Calle de Colmenar
title_short: (28410) Manzanares el Real - 3 Calle de Colmenar
description: Free public parking. Perfect to visit the castle. I haven't spent the night here but there were many RVs and vans that stayed here overnight.

title: (28410) Manzanares el Real - Avenida del Comercio
title_short: (28410) Manzanares el Real - Avenida del Comercio
description: Quiet place near the swamp. No one has bothered us. All nature.

title: (28410) Manzanares el Real -
description: Parking with very good views. It has no services but nobody has bothered us. Traffic noise

title: (28770) Colmenar Viejo - 2 Avenida de la Tejera
title_short: (28770) Colmenar Viejo - 2 Avenida de la Tejera
description: The parking area of the shopping center "the window of the Sierra". Toilets inside

title: (28413) El Boalo - 9 Calle Cañada
description: Nice views, nearby fountain and picnic tables, dumpsters, good place to run and bike, climb 30mins. Quiet place to sleep.

title: (28400) Collado Villalba - 33 Calle Cañada Real
description: Place to park in Villalba, near the old town and near shopping centers

title: (28490) Becerril de la Sierra - 2 Avenida de las Flores
title_short: (28490) Becerril de la Sierra - 2 Avenida de las Flores

title_short: (28490) Becerril de la Sierra - Carretera de Colmenar Viejo

title: (28260) Galapagar - 2 Calle Ana María Matute
description: Quiet parking to sleep near the gas station and the sports center near the center of town.

title: (28430) Alpedrete - 32B Calle de Santa Quiteria
description: Parking place where many cars enter and there is a lot of space. Right in front there is a huge park with skate park soccer fields and a fountain

title: (28410) Manzanares el Real - 33 Avenida de la Pedriza
title_short: (28410) Manzanares el Real - 33 Avenida de la Pedriza
description: Stop next to the Manzanares river. Spectacular view of La Pedriza. Good place to start a walking tour. There is room for at least three motorhomes. Going down you cross a bridge over the river that is evocative.

title: (28430) Alpedrete - 24 Calle de la Pasada
description: Nice place in the mountains of Madrid, surrounded by nature, there are quarries but bathing is prohibited, a fishing spot, ample flat parking and with the possibility of many hiking and MTB routes

title: (28439) Alpedrete - 22 Calle de la Parra
description: Very quiet residential area, with a playground.

title: (28232) Las Rozas de Madrid - 56 Avenida de Esparta
title_short: (28232) Las Rozas de Madrid - 56 Avenida de Esparta
description:
A nice and a quiet parking place in front of the kids school. Apple of parking spices nearby as well. absolutely quite at night, amazing to sleep.. woke up with birds chiringuito around 6 and 8 by school kids noise. No sign of any type of prohibition.
Pharmacy and other shops at 5 mins walk. Carrefour, and Fuel station at 5 mins drive. Next to it mall of all big brands like Puma, addidas, Leroy Merlín.

title: (28770) Colmenar Viejo - Km. 4.5 Carretera Guadalix
description: Recreational area the hermitage of Remedies. Quiet location next to a little-traveled road. Ideal to spend a night in the area without problems.

title: (28430) Alpedrete - 32 Calle del Licenciado Vidriera
description: Quiet parking with the possibility of routes

title: (28492) Mataelpino - 30 Calle Manuel de Falla
description: Large flat and quiet land parking with beautiful views.

title: (28492) El Boalo - 72P Avenida de los Linares
title_short: (28492) El Boalo - 72P Avenida de los Linares
description: Wooded parking in the center of the village. It is a quiet place to stay overnight, even if it is in the city. There is a large parking lot, in the upper part it is more hidden from view and there is a lot of shade. It is in the center but it is discreet and very calm. Opposite there are shops and next to it is the town square, where there is a fountain and wc. At the foot of the Maliciosa, in the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park. There are many trails, PR, GR, Camino de Santiago ... it is also near La Pedriza, La Barranca and Puerto de Navacerrada.

title: (28260) Galapagar - 14 Calle del Zafiro
description: Motorhome parking in a quiet urbanization. The urbanization has a guard booth with a barrier but they always open as it is an urbanization built on public land.

title: (28492) Mataelpino - 14 Calle del Pocillo
description: Dirt parking on the outskirts of town, next to the Camino de Santiago. Dirt parking in the upper part of the town, at the exit towards La Maliciosa and La Barranca. The Camino de Santiago and a cattle route pass by, a little further on there is a cattle resting place with a large trough where dogs can cool off very comfortably. Very quiet and discreet place to spend the night although it is within the town. Nearby there are shops and the town square, where there is a fountain and bathrooms. There is also a hostel for pilgrims. From that point there are two super nice roads, one to the west along the livestock route and the other to the east through the Sierra de los Porrones, with spectacular views). At the foot of Maliciosa, in the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park. There are many routes, PR, GR, Camino de Santiago... La Pedriza, La Barranca and Puerto de Navacerrada are also nearby.

title: (28232) Las Rozas - 1 Camino Viejo de las Matas
title_short: (28232) Las Rozas - 1 Camino Viejo de las Matas
description: Recreation area Puente De Retamar. Next to the area, stone tables. Rio where children can play. Shaded areas.

title: (28048) Madrid - 2A Carretera Colmenar Viejo
description: A large, flat, sandy parking area not far from the palace, dam and reservoir, with shade for cars but little for taller vehicles. The more than 40 picnic tables suggest that it gets crowded in the summer. Good for walking, including steps to the river. It can be windy, with little shelter. Clean and quiet. There is no lighting.

title: (28232) Las Rozas de Madrid - 29 Travesía de Navalcarbón
title_short: (28232) Las Rozas de Madrid - 29 Travesía de Navalcarbón
description: Ample parking in front of the Las Rozas natural park, very quiet and safe, we have spent 3 great nights, easy transportation to the center of Madrid.

title: (28492) El Boalo - 22 M-617
description: Parking next to Mataelpino from where a route leaves to crown Maliciosa. A little uneven, without services. The bad thing is that at night on weekends the "fornicas" of the area go with the thud and when they leave the picoletos appear and they wake you up with bangs and then apologize because totally, the parking is not not prohibited. Better during the week.

title: (28232) Las Rozas de Madrid - 24 Carretera de El Escorial
title_short: (28232) Las Rozas de Madrid - 24 Carretera de El Escorial
description: A meadow area that you reach a few meters from a path along the road. The path leads to some farms but there is space with grass on one side. No services, quiet place.

title: (28492) Manzanares el Real - 6 Camino Canto Cochino
title_short: (28492) Manzanares el Real - 6 Camino Canto Cochino
description: Parking in the natural park, do not attract attention with table and chairs. A place popular with rich people. No water and close by there a bar that has the toilet.

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 13 Calle 6 Sau
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 13 Calle 6 Sau
description: It is a 24h Carrefour express gas station, it will be the first night here I suppose it will be good for us, since we have many truckers also resting here, the good thing that we also have is that you can buy at the same gas station for an emergency I hope it helps

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Autopista del Noroeste
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Autopista del Noroeste
description: Parking in the Service area of the Cepsa gas station, if you come on the A6 towards Madrid, to rest before entering Madrid, we spend the night and sleep is fine, at 23.00 the gas station and the bar close until 7 , 00 so there is little movement, except for a few trucker who stop to rest.

title: (28492) Manzanares el Real - 3 Camino Canto Cochino
title_short: (28492) Manzanares el Real - 3 Camino Canto Cochino
description: Car parking without problem for motorhomes, overnight allowed from October to April, no mobile coverage.

title: (28232) Las Rozas - Unnamed Road
description: Huge local parking area free of charge. If not busy you can park little behind to disconnect from road noice. Near by: supermarket,restaurants and bars, athletic stadium and swimming pool, indoor skydiving simulator and very nice park for walks or bycicle rides. Water pumps with drinkable water placed on the side of the park. Also 300 m far is Repsol gas station. If you need WIFI there is street full of little restaurants with accesible connection.

title: (28048) Madrid - 1D Calle Almenas
description: Close to the center, along a busy road, but there are currently several campers, parking is officially not allowed along the (quite quiet) road with a park next to it.

title: (28270) Colmenarejo - 18 Calle de la Cañada Real
title_short: (28270) Colmenarejo - 18 Calle de la Cañada Real
description: Street lit, without services, we spend the night and it was very good, cars spend the night, and the morning runners and bikers, but very well, civil guard.

title: () -
description: Very quiet picnic area, with lots of tables and stone snacks. It is also a cattle route. Overnight with a car one night and great

title: (28232) Las Rozas de Madrid - 14 Calle Copenhague
title_short: (28232) Las Rozas de Madrid - 14 Calle Copenhague
description: Repsol gas station with water service, I don't know if it is drinkable, and air. The water pressure is low, you have to come early. As for the air pressure, it reaches up to 6bars.

title: (28760) Tres Cantos - 7 Calle Cotos
description: Parking for the area of the valley with a stream nearby. It is usually empty. There is a highway nearby, but at a safe distance. There is no explicit prohibition for any vehicle.

title: (28450) Collado Mediano - 3 Calle de los Sauces
title_short: (28450) Collado Mediano - 3 Calle de los Sauces

title: (28760) Tres Cantos - Unnamed Road

title_short: (28760) Tres Cantos - 28 Travesía de la Luna
description: Source of drinking water

title: (28791) Soto del Real - Unnamed Road
description: Pleasant recreational area with tables and bins. Walking and bicycle area. Near is the road.

title: (28760) Tres Cantos - Avenida de la Vega
title_short: (28760) Tres Cantos - Avenida de la Vega
description: Parking is allowed on the avenue de la Vega on the right side except on Thursdays when there is a market. place near urban area and central park. Several sources of drinking water. swings for children and calisthenics box (pull-up bars) close. In summer, terraces are installed along the avenue that serve food until 3 in the morning.

title: (28270) Colmenarejo - Camino de Villamantilla
description: “La Ermita” parking area, quiet place, picnic tables and drinking water fountains. All types of services in Colmer at 2 km.

title_short: (28760) Tres Cantos - 6 Avenida de la Luz

title: (28292) El Escorial - 2A Calle Principal

title_short: (28791) Soto del Real - Avenide de Puente Real
description: lovely place to camp

title: (28292) El Escorial - 3A Calle Principal
description: Parking next to El Náutico Restaurant. Very nice and quiet area although at night you can receive neighbors a little partying but without major problem and not until too late. In the restaurant you eat great! Recommended.

title: (28270) Colmenarejo - Unnamed Road
description: Small car park with direct access to the reservoir. Bathing is prohibited in the reservoir and it is required to be in compliance with the responsible declaration of the CHT to be able to navigate with a SUP board or any other boat. There are usual checks.

title: (28231) Las Rozas de Madrid - 12 Calle Castillo de Peñafiel
title_short: (28231) Las Rozas de Madrid - 12 Calle Castillo de Peñafiel
description: Ecolaundry Self-Service Laundry with payment by mobile application or by coins

title: (28410) Manzanares el Real - 2 Diseminado los Algibes
title_short: (28410) Manzanares el Real - 2 Diseminado los Algibes
description:
Silent parking for the night, overcrowded on weekends, close to many trekking and the climbing Area "La raja" 
Small river nearby . No drinking water or trash. Keep the place clean!

title: (28791) Madrid - 1 Diseminado Cr Manzanares
description: Parking to rest and then follow the route! Clean point.

title: (28760) Tres Cantos - 2 Avenida de Mariano Aragón García
title_short: (28760) Tres Cantos - 2 Avenida de Mariano Aragón García
description: Terre parking near a pine forest and the Pinosierra American private school. Only some parents use it momentarily to go to drop off and pick up the children from the boarding school. You will recognize it from the highway by a giant flag of the United States that is in the entrance. Very quiet residential area with quick access to the 607 motorway

title: (28491) Navacerrada - 3A Calle del Párroco Desiderio García
title_short: (28491) Navacerrada - 3A Calle del Párroco Desiderio García
description: A beautiful place by the river without noise and perfect as a starting point for many routes. It is a bit difficult to find the level but it is easy and as it is right at the entrance of the natural park it is allowed to stay overnight.

title: (28760) Tres Cantos - 197 Avenida de los Artesanos
title_short: (28760) Tres Cantos - 197 Avenida de los Artesanos
description: Fairgrounds. Paved parking. Free RV and truck parking. near the central park of three songs and the lake. Drinking fountains available. 1 gas station 24 hours nearby. very quiet area. On Fridays some cars come together to have a bottle, especially in summer. On Thursday mornings they put on a market so it is filled with vehicles

title: (28791) Soto del Real - 18 Avenida de los Jazmines
title_short: (28791) Soto del Real - 18 Avenida de los Jazmines
description: Area to park and spend the night, both on this straight and in front of the football field

title: (28491) Navacerrada - Magdalena 15-17
description: Quiet place to park and spend the night. It lacks services but it is very close to the urban center and one step away from the Navacerrada reservoir.

title: (28791) Soto del Real - 1 Calle San Jorge
title_short: (28791) Soto del Real - 1 Calle San Jorge
description: Terrain parking in the middle of Soto del Real. Quiet place.

title: (28491) Navacerrada - 2 Avenida del Rosal
description: Quiet place where you can park with 3 stone tables and litter bins. quiet area to sleep

title: (28491) Navacerrada - 3 Pasaje de las Eras
description: Small parking on the other side of the park. a little more flat and quiet for my taste, there is less passage of people and on Sundays there are fewer people, because in the parking lot below many people leave the car to take the vermouth from the El Porron bar and sometimes they block the access road , do not miss visiting it, playground next door. It is a parkimg not a campsite. prohibited to take out goods abroad. Vehicles over 7m50 pass carefully

title: (28491) Navacerrada - 9A Calle Presbítero Blanco
description:
Free public parking just behind the local police office. To enter this place you must have access between the police building and El Porrón Restaurant.
At the corner of the entrance you can see a yellow sign indicating the direction to this public parking.
It is a place protected from the wind and very quiet since it is located between urbanized areas and although it is very close to the center, no noise or traffic is heard.
It has a large park but the nearest fountain is in Plaza del Gargantón a few meters away and from which you can catch water but not load tanks with hose.
At the moment it is of beaten earth and it is a very calm place.
Prohibited to remove tables, chairs or any other camping element. Please respect the environment and use the bins.

title: (28231) Las Rozas de Madrid - 2 Calle Comunidad de Baleares
title_short: (28231) Las Rozas de Madrid - 2 Calle Comunidad de Baleares
description: Parking where to spend the night, about 3 ac and camper about 5 depending on the site. The gas station is close enough. peaceful place.

title: (28491) Navacerrada - 15 Calle Tejera
description: Small esplanade to park during the day and overnight. The road is next to it but at night no cars pass by. It is the beginning of an area of hiking and MTB routes.

title: (28760) Tres Cantos - Calle de Batanes
description: Sunny land empowered as public parking. Near the restaurant La Hípica

title: (28760) Tres Cantos - 7 Ronda de Valdecarrizo
description: Free parking for trucks and all kinds of camper cars and others, during the day many cars pass because there are factories around but at night no one passes on the road and it is very quiet, next to it there is a promenade with trees to walk, go for a walk with the dog It is to stop one day when you are very tired. there are garbage cans on the street.

title: (28048) Madrid - M-612
description: Small parking site with picknick table and a beautiful view. to have a relaxed day and enjoy nature or the tasteful restaurant at the other side of the road.

title: (28770) Colmenar Viejo -
description: Space under the trees on the left before arriving at the convent. quiet and surrounded by nature. No internet. I rode with a 6m van that could go with a slightly larger motorhome.

title: (28220) Majadahonda - 2 Camino del Pocito
description: Ideal resting place for motorhomes in transit. At the entrance of a road to a private farm, zero circulation next to a residence, in front of the pines. First one hundred meters asphalted, between two schools, school days and and at school hours, a lot of parked cars, outside these zero hours Supermarkets at 800 m, Madrid M40 and M50 ring roads at ten and five minutes Perfect rest, nearby houses

title: () Soto de Viñuelas -
description: In the middle of nature, away from everything, few people come and you are surrounded by trees, near the Isabel channel. Ideal if you like nature.

title: (28491) Navacerrada - Calle Carretera la Barranca 6
description: Parking to start routes through the Malicious and Bola del mundo. Compact earth soil with a little slope in its lower part. It lacks services except garbage and has two parking areas (I prefer the parking above). TO SLEEP: They have recently banned overnight in the entire National Park environment. RECOMMENDED: Quiet and secure parking in Navacerrada

title: (28270) Madrid -
description: Quiet parking next to the Valmayor Reservoir dam. Good leveling.

title: (28220) Majadahonda - 2 Calle Granja del Conde
description: Giant parking parallel to the road. Right now it's Sunday at 22:53 and there are cars passing by. The good part is that it is next to the headquarters of the local police and in front of a grocery store that is still open.

title: (28229) Villanueva del Pardillo - 4A Camino Villafranca
description: Parking located next to the Antavilla school. 5 minutes from a bus stop that goes directly to Madrid (Moncloa). Supermarkets, shops, workshops, bars and restaurants, in the town. Trash cans nearby. Playgrounds nearby. Dirt and gravel soil, fairly level, depending on the area.

title: (28048) Madrid -
description: Pothole dirt parking. Area with tables spread around. Do not make fire. Several routes to enjoy hiking through Mount El Pardo.

title: (28221) Majadahonda - 129 Calle Las Norias
description: Quiet, flat location next to a nice park

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Río Guadiana
description: Large esplanade with part in shadow next to several gas stations with shop and a Supercor. Very quiet, even at the Guadarrama parties.

title: (28048) Madrid - 48 Carretera Madrid-El Pardo
description: Parking on the banks of the Manzanares River. Area with covered and outdoor parking. You can go fishing and go hiking. There is a drinking fountain, tables and a children's play area past the fountain. There are also river beach areas to get your feet wet.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 5 Calle de los Escoriales
description: Parking behind the supermarket with many places for any size. Did not slept here, but used to visit the city

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 5B Calle de los Escoriales
description: For troubleshooting, NON-DRINKING water at the service station.

title: (28222) Majadahonda - Camino de la Dehesa
description: Parking in the middle of nature very quiet and without problems of staying overnight! During the day it has a little traffic of vehicles, but the night very quiet.

title: (28220) Majadahonda - 9 Calle la Traviata
description: Quiet and well located location. There is a Mc Donalds nearby and also a supermarket. We spent the night and during the day we went by bus to the center of Madrid

title: (28220) Majadahonda - 4D Camino Mina
description: Quiet vacant lot in a residential neighborhood on the outskirts of Madrid. The population here is high income so there is a lot of tranquility. We have spent one night. Good views of Madrid and a lot of silence.

title: (28470) Cercedilla - 211 Diseminado Embalse Navalmedio
description: Parking on the ground. Quiet, access by small road in good condition. Hiking, mountain biking and climbing. Do not forget that it is a car park, not a campsite, we are discreet, to empty and fill one goes to the El Boalo area. Be careful in winter, the road can be cut by the snow.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 12 Calle de la Sierra
description: Parking for cars and RVs. You can spend the night here during the week and outside of events. Then many cars park here and it will be difficult to get out again. We visited the medieval market. Very quiet during the week. Without services.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 21 Calle Fuente del Espino
description: Quiet street for parking with chalets on both sides. We have spent the night very very well. Recommended for a rest stop.

name: Camping Capfun El Escorial
title: (28200) Camping Capfun El Escorial
description: Nice campsite. Shaded or sunny locations. Madrid by bus in 40 minutes. El Escorial by bus in 10 minutes. Restaurant.piscines.supermarche.bus 10 minutes walk. 1000 m altitude.

title: (28048) Madrid - Carr. Somontes al Palacio de la Real Quinta
title_short: (28048) Madrid - Carr. Somontes al Palacio de la Real Quinta

A restaurant bar is located around the lake, you can go there by canoe or paddle. We bathed every day, the water is quite clean. Around you can see the mountains, it's very pretty! We went to eat at a restaurant (7min by car) “restaurante casavieja” we eat very well there!

title: (28046) Madrid - 2A Calle Tulipan
description: Free gravel parking used by locals. It's a little hard to find the right entry. It seems unregulated but everybody uses it and you won't get a ticket. The entry roads are VERY bumpy with lots of potholes, it gets better inside the parking and it's worth it, you won't find a free parking as well situated in Madrid. It's very close to one of the main train stations (CHAMARTIN) and bus stations (PLAZA DE CASTILLA) and there are bars and supermarkets all around. It's also unusually silent for it's location appart from the rush hours where people parks in our out to go to work/home. I asked around and everybody said that it was a very safe place to park as well.
